summary: When Dan Sanders (Brendan Fraser) takes a job overseeing the construction of a supposedly "green" housing development in the Oregon woods, he thinks his greatest challenge will be helping his urban-oriented family (Brooke Shields, Matt Prokop) adjust to country life while simultaneously trying to keep his demanding boss happy. But, when the local animals learn that Dan is in charge of their habitat's destruction, the fur flies in an all-out battle between man and nature.

reviews.content: This is the greatest movie ever. So well written and the squirrel is cool. Like, literally the greatest cinematic masterpiece ever.üêø

Absolutely dreadful. Horrible horrible movie- This traumatized me as a kid and I literally just thought of it for no reason and just had to leave a review. I get the "point." It's so in your face, and is as subtle as a sledgehammer to the face, and the whole time you just want it to stop. The point where he has a nightmare and he wakes his wife up to see her with a raccoon face (it kinda makes sense in context... Kinda) was the moment the gave me nightmares for years.

Maybe I wasn't the target audience for this but I found this to be one of the worst films I've ever seen that made me angry. Brendan Fraser is an excellent actor and wasted on this but for me terrible. I'm sure my children would enjoy it tho and that's probably who it was aimed at?

I really hate this movie because the squrriel screaming scared the shit out of me. No offense to Brendan Fraser and Brooke Shields, they're really good actors, but I'm never seeing this movie. I rather watch The Last Airbender. No Offense M. Night Shyamalan. Furry Vengeance is the WORST MOVIE EVERRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!!
i mildy enjoyed this film it was creative and original it made me laugh
This is the most giddy movie of the animal genre yet!!!
My wife insisted we stay to the end.   We'd paid, and we were going to see it through.   Oh dear.
It is hilarious !!!!! I am looking to buy a copy.
Loved it! We laughed so hard. Great actors and I loved the save the environment theme. Animals get their vengeance in a hilarious way. Who doesn't love Ken Jeong, Brenden Frazier, and Brooke Shields.
It took me 3 days to get through this monstrosity.  In the immortal words of Jay Sherman "It STINKS!"
Epic epic fortnite gamer epic film
Meh, the performances were good but the damn thing is made to be unlikable
Boring and unfunny, this animal movie will definitely be one of those movies that you should instantly avoid
Love this movie.  So funny!!
It felt like a plot line thats been so over done and stepped on. Only brightened by Brendan Fraser. It was fine to watch with my 9 and 6 year old boys but I wouldnt watch it again.

Want to know why we barely hear from Brendan Fraser anymore? This is why. Even at 92 minutes, the movie's far too long and the joke of "animals beat up Brendan Fraser" quickly overstays its welcome. Is this movie even worth a full review? No. It's not good, it sucks, it sucks real hard. That's all there is to it.

The viewing experience I got from this film was absolute torture. The comedy hardly ever lands, the plot is dreadful and pathetic, and the messages it tries to teach us don't work at all. Extremely stupid and bombastically bad. What else is there left to say?
I haven't been naughty, why am I being abused
Good kids movie I thought
Decent cast, bad humor and effects.

A movie I'm not sure how to describe. I'm a big fan of Brendan and he did a fine job in the movie but the plot is flawed and strange. Most of the movie I felt Brendan's character wasn't really the bad guy, yet he was constantly treated as such by his family and the animals. As an adult watching the film I felt he was the victim just trying to do his job. overall the humor is a bit lacking but entertaining for kids, and it is amusing to see Brendan's character go crazy from the animals, But I can really only recommend watching this for group discussion about the characters actions and decision.
i think this movie one of the best soo much fun and hilarious i love it
Its funny for the kids but the plot is just so over the place and the story has no meaning whatsoever
While it is fair to watch, this movie is ruined by dumb acting, annoying plot devices for kids, and overall weirdness. Just kind of a mess.
I... hate... THAT FILM!
The raccoon was hilarious in this, and the guy learned a valuable lesson - I recommend to anyone.

Beautiful high definition fine weather film but the furious furry constructionbusters should have been constant in their battle strategies with a variety of devastating ways that would cause the construction workers to run a mile ;;
A raccoon saves his home from a thoughtless human developer in this cute but forgetful family romp.
Brendan Fraser tries his best, but it isnt enough for the bland unfunny plot that constantly falls off the rails
creepy and nothing but abuse, the trailer looked funny
Not as bad as I thought it would be, but still pretty bad.
Subjecting poor Brendan Fraser and whoever's watching to unfunny and uninspired visual gags. Furry Vengeance stretches it's TV movie premise way too far, and is extremely preachy to boot
For those teens that have little imagination.
The filmmakers must have been thinking during the making of this movie, "How many god-awful ways can we embarrass Brendan Fraser and ruin his career?"

Oh my goodness! What is this f*gly disaster? I feel like I just wasted 2 hours of my life. Who exactly is this film appealing to? This film is just as bad as a normal Adam Sandler comedy with its over use of toilet humor that is just revolting to look at. I didn't laugh once at this. The writing, acting, and uncanny stereotypes are just horrible. It is the definition of torture. Don't ever make the mistake I did by watching this piece of crap.
I liked it. I thought it was decent. It was not terrible and was very very funny at times. It was somewhat silly and almost dumb, but it was sweet and had some good family moments.

Oh Brandon, what happened to you? I realize that your not in the spotlight anymore, but did you really have to sink this low!? 
Go ahead and call it family friendly, but at a price, and that is your own sanity!
Not good, not good at all
IIts stupid and innocent, a nice change,
Dumb ripoff of Evan almighty with Brendan Fraser.
Lol...  Very funny watchin now
Ample entertainment for pre-teens
Great family film, never get tired of seeing it again and again
A pretty fun kids movie where you laugh more at the ridiculousness of the plot then the actual jokes.
Awesome movie,very funny also
Silly stupid farce for kids only
The childish demeanor of Dr. Dolittle gone awry; this movie is absolutely terrible.

Sight gags and cheesy dialogue don't save this movie. In fact, this is one of the stupidest movies I've ever seen. Brendan Frasier cannot be taken seriously as an actor anymore because of his career choices to be in movies like these, which do nothing but make the little kids laugh and the older ones and adults cringe.
Para hacer consciencia a el respeto por los animales, pero paradojicamente, donde esta el respeto por los humanos?
Hahah such a funny movie
Funny,Very Funny. Just Good Ol' Family Entertainment.
Funny but a definite low budget movie
Furry Vengeance is so bad the mere mentioning of its title is enough to make one burst out laughing.

(17%)
Stupid, silly family comedy that will only entertain the smallest of children. Maybe not as dire as most critics will have you think, but it's still a movie mostly about the likeable Brendan Fraser getting bit, urinated on, crapped on and chased by animals that don't really act like animals should or would. Stick with 1988's  "the great outdoors".

wow ummn just seen this movie 4 the 1st time n think that this is an enjoyable movie 2 watch......its got a good cast of actors/actressess throughout this movie.....i think that brendan fraser, brooke shields, matt prokop, ken jeong (from the brilliant hangover movies), wallace shawn (from the brilliant movie the princess bride the brilliant tv series family guy), samantha bee, dee bradley baker (from the brilliant tv series american dad),  play good roles/parts throughout this movie......i think that the director of this comedy/kids/family movie had done a good job of directing this movie because you never know what 2 expect throughout this movie.....i think that brendan fraser was good as the lead role thorughout this movie.......its got a good soundtrack throughout this movie........i think that this is an enjoyable movie 2 watch.....sure it is nothing special 2 watch but its still quite a funny movie 2 watch......i think that its got a good soundtrack throughout this movie......i think that dee bradley baker was great throughout this movie.....i think that this is an enjoyable kids movie 2 watch its a really enjoyable movie 2 watch its got a good cast throughout this movie......i think that brandon fraser was good throughout this movie.....sure it is nothing special 2 watch but its still a funny movie 2 watch its got a good cast thorughout this movie.......YOU HAVE GOT TO WATCH THE END OF THE CREDITS THROUGHOUT THIS MOVIE.......i think that this is an enjoyable movie 2 watch its got a good cast throughout this movie its an enjoyable movie 2 watch with a good cast throughout this movie
A ordinary comedy with a funny moments between a hilarious Brendan Fraser and crazy animals. Furry Vengeance is good because don't take the story too much serious.

This movie is basically every other family comedy that has been released in the last 10-15 years. Boring and cliched plot, unfunny jokes, annoying characters. I will give this movie credit for the animated beginning credits. That looked really good. Other than that, you're not going to get any quality from this trainwreck.
A ball of furry fun and animals that's what makes it so funny.
Sad Sad. This is one corny movie. about 4 laugh-out-loud moments but mostly eye-rolling at how dumb it was that someone actually thought it up and wrote it down and filmed it... yikes...
teenager movie about how nature protects itself!

He came. He saw. They conquered.

Son objectif n'est pas de profiter de la foret, mais bien de la modifier au go√ªt de son patron pour accueillir un √©norme complexe commercial et r√©sidentiel. Son arriv√©e est loin de plaire aux animaux de la f√¥ret, qui s'organisent pour d√©router cet envahisseur et emp√™cher la destruction de leur habitat. La guerre est d√©clar√©e !

Au moins l'id√©e de sensibiliser les jeunes √† sauvegarder les espaces naturels est honorable. Apparemment les enfants adorent. Les plus grands par contre s'ennuient... les gags sont simplissimes et les personnages tr√®s manich√©ens. Peu de nuance au total, mais sans √™tre ex√©crable non plus. Made me laugh at one point. The fact that I actually sat down and watched it.

This is one of those films where the trailer is good but the movie isn't. The film was good until it started getting preachy and delivered a sappy animal rights message that really goes over the hedge (sorry).

a story with crazy animals and a crazy team except the protagonist and his family /These crazy animals lead by a raccoon are fighting for their life in a village in the 'center of nowhere ' (quite Greek but hope you understand me ) somewhere in USA. A crazy movie otherwise. The only i can say that GCI is quite believable for real life animation . otherwise the movie is a B class movie
It's a kind of stupid movie that i wouldn't mind watching again..
no plot, but you don't watch this for the story, you watch it for the classy humor of seeing people be silly and abstract. children will love this movie.
Definitely a kids movie. Weird plot and dialogue, but there were a few funny parts.

i like the idea that over all time there was a group of animals protecting the forest. but this would have probably been a better animated movie with talking animals instead of the goofy "film" presented. it tries to be funny but it really isin't becaise none of it can be taken seriously. bredan fraser annoyed the crap outta me, he just couldn't funtion. everybody should feel really bad about making this movie the way it was. it would have probably been good if it had been animated
great family movie! kept my seven year old son laughing
Oh God. OH GOD. This movie is painfully stupid! You will want to plow the Everglades over in frustration after watching this!

This film has unfunny and offensive written all over its face. Even though the actors do an okay job, the characters come off as unlikable and the jokes are just mean-spirited. And no, don't remind me of the closing number because that was total bullshit to watch! Avoid this unfunny hack of a film at all costs!

I bought this movie for my little brother who likes stupid movies.  I'm giving it 2 stars because at least it knows it's a dumb, pointless film (typical "family comedy" garbage) and doesn't try to be more.

This movie tries so hard to be funny. Slapstick jokes are hurled at you after every second, to the point where it gets annoying. However, there are probably children who can manage to get a couple of laughs out of this comedy. I remember a few scenes that made me crack a smile.

At first I kind of like this movie, but then I lost interest in it. Why did I get it on DVD?! I only got it on DVD because I wanted to see what the film is like. I might sell the DVD though. 


First of all, BRENDAN FRASIER HAD BAD ACTING!!!! I'd prefer Steve Carrell. What's the point of the animals? They are so stupid. All of the characters in this movie are idiots, this movie makes no sense at all. I'd rather watch Twilight than this crap.
Terrible, just time out of my life that I'll never get back.
Vengance? I CANT UNDERSTAND!

I saw this film a while Back on TV. And this film is really good for a kids film.
GRADE:B+
Probably fun for young children, but the story is as superficial as it gets for this eco-friendly moral story.
it    was  very funny and the bear drived the car and the animals beatened up the evil man and lots of farting that s why we gave it 5 stars

Brendan Fraser takes a lot of horrifying abuse from woodland creatures. That's basically it, the slapstick stretching far too long for the audience's satisfaction or the crude toilet gags that surround the thin plot or the uneven acting from the less than comfortable Brooke Shields, who despite some average jokes, has no comic timing.
Genuinely one of the worst films I've ever seen.
jajajjaj..me mori. de la risa....muy chida...
little funny, much boring. The animals were cute, but it doesmt make sense. How come a rachoon could design a trap very well. And the trap is only repetation. The story is really simple .
Why was this movie even made? Movies like this make Batman and Robin seem reasonable.
This is actually a very good movie. It's hilarious. Believe me.
2.5/4. It was alright
I found this to be pretty funny and enjoyable and not as bad as everybody says it is.
Unfunny, unoriginal, and redundant.
Never showed much promise and reached few heights. Furry Vengeance shows where Brendan Fraser's career has gone, and also why live action animal movies are rarely funny.
Worst film I have ever seen. Cringe worthy humour and awful plot line leaves Bendan Frasers latest film in the dust.
